title: Two fonts: a dotty and a line
content:
Please may I have some help identifying these two; they're from [http://www.gemmabooth.com/](http://web.archive.org/web/20131017143527/http:/www.gemmabooth.com/ "http://www.gemmabooth.com/") (the font changes each time the page is refreshed). The site was designed by YES studio.

Thank you.

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [small.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20131017143527/http:/typophile.com/files/small_0.jpg) | 597.55 KB |
author: Rachel C

comments.content: The lined font is ITC Neon. According to Mike Bowfin Yanega part of the Image Club Letterpress 5.0 CD.
Try [Dieter Steffmann’s version of Rudolf Koch’s Prisma](http://web.archive.org/web/20131017143527/http:/moorstation.org/Koch_Memorial/dl/dl_02.htm)
